claim: Flublok contains 3x the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines, which has been linked to greater immunogenicity vs standard-dose flu vaccines.

extracted_evidence.quote: AN EXACT STRAIN MATCH 4 5 The only recombinant flu vaccine that has known and exact antigen content, Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO 3 x THE ANTIGEN1-3 Flublok also contains 3 x the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard dose flu vaccines, which has been linked to greater immunogenicity 3 x
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that Flublok contains 3 times the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines and directly links this higher antigen content to greater immunogenicity, supporting both parts of the claim.

extracted_evidence.quote: in January 2024, vaccination with a higher dose recombinant flu vaccine may induce a more robust antibody response than egg based standard dose vaccines.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote supports the claim by stating that higher dose recombinant flu vaccines, such as Flublok, may induce a more robust antibody response compared to standard-dose, egg-based vaccines, which relates to greater immunogenicity.
